import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Row, Col, Tab, Tabs } from 'react-bootstrap' import Product from '../components/Product' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from '../components/Message' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { stormProducts } from '../actions/productActions' import Count from '../components/Count' function StormScreen() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const stormList = useSelector(state => state.stormList) const {error, loading, products} = stormList useEffect(() => { dispatch(stormProducts()) }, [dispatch]) return (

Countdown Timer

) } export default StormScreen
